channel.title: python on Keep It Simple
channel.description: Recent content in python on Keep It Simple

item.title: Python 基础
item.description: 字符串 在python中，用引号括起来的都是字符串，其中的引号可以是单引号，也可以是双引号。这种灵活性让我们能够在字符串中包含引号或单引号： print('This is a string') print("This is also a string") print('I told my friend, "python is my favorite language"') print("The language 'Python' is named after Monty Python, not the snake") This is a string This is also a string I told my friend, "python is my favorite language" The language 'Python' is
